Key Match Events: Daniel Muñoz scored the opening goal for Colombia in the 32nd minute.
Jefferson Lerma scored the second goal for Colombia in the 42nd minute.
Julio Enciso scored the lone goal for Paraguay in the 69th minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Colombia coach Moreno praised the team's performance and effort.
James Rodríguez was highlighted for his role in creating both goals.
Others: The match was held at NRG Stadium in Houston, Texas, with an attendance of 67,059.
The game was covered by FS1.
